column1: Smoque BBQ////This is probably the best BBQ I've had in the city. The meats are tender
column3: and the selection is amazing (even sidedishes). The only downside is how little seating there is
column4: but you can just take yours to go. If I didn't live so far away
column5: I would frequent Smoque more often. I would recommend trying their combinations to experience their various meats.
